trans-unit.source: How to configure a cloud service | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to configure a cloud service | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure cloud services in Azure. Learn to update the cloud service configuration and configure remote access to role instances.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure cloud services in Azure. Learn to update the cloud service configuration and configure remote access to role instances.

trans-unit.source: How to Configure Cloud Services
trans-unit.target: How to Configure Cloud Services

trans-unit.source: You can configure the most commonly used settings for a cloud service in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can configure the most commonly used settings for a cloud service in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you like to update your configuration files directly, download a service configuration file to update, and then upload the updated file and update the cloud service with the configuration changes.
trans-unit.target: Or, if you like to update your configuration files directly, download a service configuration file to update, and then upload the updated file and update the cloud service with the configuration changes.

trans-unit.source: Either way, the configuration updates are pushed out to all role instances.
trans-unit.target: Either way, the configuration updates are pushed out to all role instances.

trans-unit.source: You can also enable a Remote Desktop connection to one or all roles running in your cloud service.
trans-unit.target: You can also enable a Remote Desktop connection to one or all roles running in your cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Remote Desktop allows you to access the desktop of your application while it is running and troubleshoot and diagnose problems.
trans-unit.target: Remote Desktop allows you to access the desktop of your application while it is running and troubleshoot and diagnose problems.

trans-unit.source: You can enable a Remote Desktop connection to your role even if you did not configure the service definition file (.csdef) for Remote Desktop during application development.
trans-unit.target: You can enable a Remote Desktop connection to your role even if you did not configure the service definition file (.csdef) for Remote Desktop during application development.

trans-unit.source: There is no need to redeploy your application in order to enable a Remote Desktop connection.
trans-unit.target: There is no need to redeploy your application in order to enable a Remote Desktop connection.

trans-unit.source: Azure can only ensure 99.95 percent service availability during the configuration updates if you have at least two role instances for every role.
trans-unit.target: Azure can only ensure 99.95 percent service availability during the configuration updates if you have at least two role instances for every role.

trans-unit.source: That enables one virtual machine to process client requests while the other is being updated.
trans-unit.target: That enables one virtual machine to process client requests while the other is being updated.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Service Level Agreements</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Service Level Agreements</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Change a cloud service
trans-unit.target: Change a cloud service

trans-unit.source: In the <link><linkText>Azure Preview Portal</linkText><title></title></link>, navigate to your cloud service.
trans-unit.target: In the <link><linkText>Azure Preview Portal</linkText><title></title></link>, navigate to your cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Settings icon or the Essentials/All settings link to open up the Settings blade.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Settings icon or the Essentials/All settings link to open up the Settings blade.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Settings Page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Settings Page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From here you can view the Properties, change the Configuration, manage the Certificates, and manage the Users who have access to this cloud service.
trans-unit.target: From here you can view the Properties, change the Configuration, manage the Certificates, and manage the Users who have access to this cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Under the Monitoring section you can click on any tile to configure alerts.
trans-unit.target: Under the Monitoring section you can click on any tile to configure alerts.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud Service Monitoring</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud Service Monitoring</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Under the Roles and instances section you can click on any cloud service role to manage the instance.
trans-unit.target: Under the Roles and instances section you can click on any cloud service role to manage the instance.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud Service Instance</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud Service Instance</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can remotely connect to, reboot, or reimage the cloud service from here.
trans-unit.target: You can remotely connect to, reboot, or reimage the cloud service from here.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud Service Instance Buttons</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud Service Instance Buttons</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The operating system used for the cloud service cannot be changed using the Azure Preview Portal, you can only change this setting through the non-preview portal.
trans-unit.target: The operating system used for the cloud service cannot be changed using the Azure Preview Portal, you can only change this setting through the non-preview portal.

trans-unit.source: This is detailed <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: This is detailed <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Update a cloud service configuration file
trans-unit.target: Update a cloud service configuration file

trans-unit.source: First, download the existing cloud service configuration file (.cscfg).
trans-unit.target: First, download the existing cloud service configuration file (.cscfg).

trans-unit.source: In the <link><linkText>Azure Preview Portal</linkText><title></title></link>, navigate to your cloud service.
trans-unit.target: In the <link><linkText>Azure Preview Portal</linkText><title></title></link>, navigate to your cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Settings icon or the Essentials/All settings link to open up the Settings blade.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Settings icon or the Essentials/All settings link to open up the Settings blade.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Settings Page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Settings Page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click on the Configuration item.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Configuration item.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configuration Blade</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configuration Blade</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click on the Download button.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Download button.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Download</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Download</linkText>

trans-unit.source: After you update the service configuration file, upload and apply the configuration updates:
trans-unit.target: After you update the service configuration file, upload and apply the configuration updates:

trans-unit.source: Follow the first 3 steps from above to open up the Configuration blade for the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Follow the first 3 steps from above to open up the Configuration blade for the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Upload button.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Upload button.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Upload</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Upload</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select the .cscfg file and click OK.
trans-unit.target: Select the .cscfg file and click OK.

trans-unit.source: Configure remote access to role instances
trans-unit.target: Configure remote access to role instances

trans-unit.source: Remote access cannot be configured using the Azure Preview Portal, you can only change this setting through the non-preview portal.
trans-unit.target: Remote access cannot be configured using the Azure Preview Portal, you can only change this setting through the non-preview portal.

trans-unit.source: This is detailed <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: This is detailed <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link>.
